document.full_text: europe should consider strengthening central control of economic policy if efforts to deal with its debt crisis do not deliver results, the head of the european central bank, jean-claude trichet, said.
document.title: trichet: more e.u. economic powers next step in crisis
lines_and_colors: europe should consider strengthening central control of economic policy if efforts to deal with its debt crisis do not deliver results, the head of the european central bank, jean-claude trichet, said.
